description.@en: Wretched talons extend from your hands, as you’re possessed by a creature’s animus.

criticalFailure.@en: Wicked thing! Your fingers and thumbs immediately bend backwards and a horrendous snapping is heard as they fold over your palms like a rakshasa’s paws. You suffer no damage from this mutation, but are unable to use your hands for 24 hours.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but victims cannot Dodge or Parry this attack.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, your hands no longer terminate in fingers and thumbs, but in deadly claws or talons. Claws are a two-handed melee weapon with the Vicious Quality. Talons are a two-handed melee weapon with the Fast Quality. Instead of using your [CB], refer to your [WB] to determine Damage. Finally, whenever you strike or Parry with these claws or talons, refer to your Odweft Skill instead of a Combat-based Skill. You can inflict Injuries with this Magick, but your foes Bleed instead.

reagents.@en: Talons of a raptor or claws of a bear
